name: Ragdoll Archers
description: A physics-based archery game where you control a ragdoll archer and compete against other archers.

name: Sky Riders
description: A fast-paced racing game where you fly through the sky and avoid obstacles.

name: City Bus Driver
description: A realistic bus driving simulator where you drive around the city and pick up passengers.

name: Table Tennis World Tour
description: A table tennis game where you compete against other players from around the world.

name: Smash Karts
description: A multiplayer kart racing game where you use weapons to take down your opponents.

name: Crazy Roll 3D
description: A 3D platformer where you control a ball and navigate through various obstacles.

name: EvoWars.io
description: A multiplayer action game where you evolve your warrior and fight against other players to become the strongest.

name: 8 Ball Billiards Classic
description: A classic billiards game where you play against the computer and try to pocket all of your balls before your opponent.

name: Helix Jump
description: A casual arcade game where you control a bouncing ball and try to navigate it through a series of obstacles.

name: Leek Factory Tycoon
description: A simulation game where you run a leek factory and try to make as much money as possible by growing and selling leeks.

name: Snake Lite
description: A classic snake game where you control a worm and try to eat as many apples as possible without running into yourself or the walls.

name: War Sea
description: A naval strategy game where you command a fleet of ships and try to defeat your enemies by sinking their ships.
